void main ( ) { int N ; int T ; int t [ 5 ] ; int * a ; int i ; int j ; scanf ( "%d 
" , & T ) ; int c = 0 ; int k = 0 ; while ( T > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d 
" , & N ) ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( ( N + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; c = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d " , & a [ i ] ) ; } int length = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < N ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) { length ++ ; if ( i + 1 == N ) { c += ( length ) * ( length - 1 ) / 2 ; } } else { length ++ ; c += ( length ) * ( length - 1 ) / 2 ; length = 0 ; } } c += N ; printf ( "%d 
" , c ) ; T -- ; } }
